mapper.sql: SELECT id, authority_id, username, password, nickname, email, profileimg, u_status, phone, logdate, regdate FROM User
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User(username, password, nickname, email, phone, authority_id, profileimg, u_status, logdate) VALUES(#{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{authority_id}, #{profileimg}, #{u_status}, #{logdate})
INSERT INTO Address(user_id, address_name, address, address_detail, postcode) VALUE(#{user_id},#{address_name},#{address},#{address_detail},#{postcode})
